definition: Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

sentences.english: Free shuttle bus services to and from Tai Po Market MTR Station is available.
sentences.chinese: 免費穿梭巴士接送往返港鐵大埔墟站。

sentences.english: Ask for $3600. Trade at Hang Hau MTR.
MTR Day Pass and Month Passes are not accepted for travel on this route.
sentences.chinese: 港鐵各全日通及全月通不適用於乘搭本路線。

sentences.english: It is accessible from Sham Mong Road and Cherry Street to Olympic MTR Station.
sentences.chinese: 可由深旺道和櫻桃街前往港鐵奧運站。

definition: light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
to open to traffic (e.g. new bridge, rail line etc)/(of a locality) to have a transportation service/(Tw) to commute
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
to add to existing facilities or services
Hong Kong LRT (Light Rail Transit) (abbr. for 輕便鐵路|轻便铁路)
